attributes.review: i opened this app and it drained my battery immediately. As i raced to get my charger, I projectile vomited onto my floor bc i am out of shape. I had no time to stop running, i need that charger so that i may keep up with our unsavory leader. Although i was committed to getting my charger as quickly as i could, i miscalculated the surface area of my vomit spillage. i slipped. i broke my neck, i have to wear an eyepatch, and one nostril permanently whistles now. My family couldn’t afford my medical bills, therefore I never got a proper neck brace. my neck is now permanently shaped like this “↪️”.  1 star. do not recommend

attributes.title: this app gave me chronic migraines
attributes.review: i downloaded it so i could get up to date news on our lord and savior donald trump. however once i started watching all the news articles and social media posts, i realized, GOOD HEAVENS! this man is a complete idiot! he can’t form a single intelligent thought! not to mention he’s extremely racist and homophobic! then this app began to start haunting me... it came to me in visions in my dreams. it started causing massive migraines at all times of the day.. i started to lose my mind. i needed to delete immediately!!! horrible app!!!! horrible man!!!! horrible “president”!!!!!!

attributes.title: Cursed App
attributes.review: First of all, this app took forever to load even with my fast internet speeds. If I can play a MMO without it lagging it messing up, then I should be able to download this app without a problem. However, it took nearly half an hour to download. It asked for lots of my personal information, phone number included, and now I’m getting constant spam texts and calls! My phone literally warns me that these calls are spam calls and put me at risk of being scammed!!! Why was my information sold to these scammers? That’s so corrupt.

attributes.title: Great grandma is mental now ):
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because My great grandma thought Donald was “attractive”, she was horrified to see his nudes, that thing was the size of the roach on her carpet. Horrified, she was absolutely traumatized that she had to be sent to the mental hospital, and she is yet to stay there. She has terrible nightmares about the event, having flashbacks every now and then. I blame this app and Donald for ever getting her involved in such nonsense to the point she worshipped him, well she doesn’t anymore um. She’s very frightened. So I blame you for this orange 😔 putting my great grandma in such frightening circumstances ✨ SHAME ON YOU

attributes.title: He literally is ruining my life and America
attributes.review: First of all, I downloaded this disgusting app to see what all these young ones are on about on social networks including tik tik. The second I downloaded it, I saw this disgusting orange, spray tanned disgrace of a man in MY FACE! And the image won’t leave my head!!! I am seriously considering hiring a priest to come and cleanse my house now !!!!!! Also, he is trying to build a wall to stop immigrants!! I am extremely offended because my ex husband’s girlfriends brother wants to come here to me but he can’t!!!!!!! So, for anyone looking to download this app, watch out!

attributes.title: Disgusting Cheeto puff 😍🤮🌝
attributes.review: when I open this app it’s like opening up a bag of Cheetos when there’s nothing in it and I’ve wasted my time even opening it 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 this app told me I had to be a fairy 🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️ to get in the app and I was like noooooo I’m not a fairy 🧚🏼‍♀️ I don’t know how to make kids dream come true so i angrily left the app I also tried to get back in the app and it said I had to eat a hundred of Cheetos puff AND I can’t eat Cheetos puffs or I’ll die 🎇☄️⚡️🔥 soooooooooo i tried again several hours and realized this is THE WROST APP EVER AND ITS COMPLETELY POINTLESS, WORTHLESS, AND DISGUSTING. IM NEVER USING THIS APP EVER AGAIN 🤮🤮🤮🤡🤡🤡❤️.

attributes.title: This app gives very much dumb vibes. Iol
attributes.review: I downloaded this app bc I hate trump and I want to send hate ✨🧚💅🏽 anywayssss I open up this app  and then out of no where I get a whole virus on my phone and my phone was glitching mad hard. Then I finally got it to work again after a few mins and than I get a lil notification on my phone telling me that I gatta send money to this orange boy or I’m finna die.  Chileee when I tell u I was shockkk. I then proceeded to deleted the app. Y’all needa take this off the App Store ASAP frr fr. This whole thing prob don’t even make sense but y’all get the point.

attributes.title: Caused my dog to die 🕊🕊
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was super glitchy and my doggie was walking over to sit on the sofa next to me and he got on and saw my phone and what I downloaded and started gagging and caused him a seizure and he died and popped on my phone and I deleted the app and then he woke up again and then I downloaded it again and he died 🕊🕊🕊🕊🕊 and puked and I deleted it again and he wouldn’t wake up because he saw the Orange 🍊 president on my tv my poor doggie R.I.P boggie died cause of trumps face 🤡🤡👺😢😢 We need to cancel Trump 💅🏽💅🏽💅🏽💅🏽 Stan with me my doggie died cause of his face 😢😢Cancel Trump 2020 🤩🤩🕊🧚🧚🧚

attributes.title: the worst app EVER🧡
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in a last attempt to see what others see in trump but i was proven 100x over that he is THE WORST. the app took a full 27 hours to download and the second i opened it there was thunder outside (the first sign that this app was bad). next i tried to navigate the app but it continued to glitch and make horrible noises that hurt my ears. everywhere i went in the app i felt unwelcome (for context i am a woman of color). in conclusion, this is possibly the worst app in the history of this united states and i HIGHKY recommend not voting- i mean downloading this app EVER.

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: Tbh I gave this a bad review because he wants to take away Tik Tok because we ruined his little rally thing, but everyone else has funny stories so here’s mine: My pet Cheeto was a Trump supporter, although he had never seen trump. Then he found this app and saw what trump looked like. He started suffering from depression. Until lone day at pet school they were passing around trumps nude and my poor Cheeto said “ No. Not only in he bright orange but his pp looks like-like SHRIMP?!?! He was so disappointed in our president that...*insert dramatic pause and sobbing* he killed himself! So that’s why I gave this App 1 Star.
